text: Di baahi wwae lua o tuhongo digau dauwa le e 337,500 siibi mo kuudi, ge 675 i nia manu aalaa ne dagitedi ang gi Dimaadua, mo 36,000 kau ang gi digau dauwa, ge 72 ne dagitedi ang gi Dimaadua, mo 30,500 ‘donkey’ ang gi digau dauwa, ge 61 ne dagitedi ang gi Dimaadua, gei e 16,000 tama ahina madammaa ang gi digau dauwa, ge 32 ne dagitedi ang gi Dimaadua.
